name: Shop user
comment: This set of permissions only gives access to documents prepared by others, showing data only for specific shops. Documents cannot be edited and downloads are limited to the minimum

EN.name: Shop user
EN.comment: This set of permissions grants access to a limited set of shops

FR.name: Utilisateur d'établissement
FR.comment: Ce groupe de permissions donne accès aux données de certains établissements uniquement.
